token.A l'esborrar el mapa desapareixerà tant: Keep in mind that erased maps will no longer show up in neither private or public gallery.
token.A l'esborrar l'aplicació desapareixerà d: Keep in mind that erased maps will no longer show up in your gallery.
token.Accedeix a la geoinformació de la xarxa: Get access to geoinformation on IDEC network
token.Accedeix a tota la informació de l': Access all the information of the
token.Accedeix al catàleg de: Access the data catalog of the
token.Adaptable a qualsevol dispositiu: PC, te: Suitable to any device: PC, phone, tablet.
Applies only to polygon type layers.
Applicable to point or polygon layers.
Applicable to point, line or polygon layers.
token.Aquest estil no es pot aplicar a cap cap: This style can't be applied to any of the layers in you map
token.Aquest prototip utilitza Cesium JS, una: This prototype uses CesiumJS, a library that creates 3D maps –based in WebGL- that needs the latest version of the web browser to operate, along with the latest drivers for the graphics card of your computer
token.Aquesta capa actualment és en ús i no es: Layer being used can't be deleted
token.Aquesta operació calcula el centre geomè: This operation calculates the geometric center or centroid of a closed surface.
token.Aquesta operació calcula els elements qu: This operation calculates the intersection of elements from different geometries.
token.Aquesta operació calcula una àrea defini: This operation calculates an area defined by a fixed distance around an item.
token.Aquesta operació fusiona els registres d: This operation combines records from two tables of same type into one.
token.Aquesta operació combina els registres d: This operation combines records from two tables into one based on the equal values of a common column.
token.Aquesta operació crea una nova capa que: This operation creates a new layer containing those points contained within the polygons of another layer.
token.Aquesta operació està disponible per cap: This operations is only available for drawing layers or layers created by 50Mb files.
token.Aquesta operació transmet la informació: This operation transmits the polygon associated information to the points contained within these polygons (polygon to point).
token.Aquesta operació retorna aquells element: This operation returns those elements that fulfill a condition relating to the associated textual information.
token.Arrossega els vèrtex o el punt per edita: Drag the vertex or point to edit the object
token.Arrossega les teves dades sobre el mapa: Drag your data on the map or click here
token.Arrossega aquí la teva imatge del teu es: Drag here your image with your logo or coat of arms
Drag outer ring: rotate view. Drag inner gyroscope: free orbit.Double-click: reset view.TIP: You can also free orbit by holding the CTRL key and dragging the map.
token.Bases topogràfiques, ortofotomapes vigen: Topographic databases, current orthophotomaps, administrative boundaries, old maps and more.

token.Carrega les teves pròpies dades (drag an: Upload your own data (drag and drop).
Find places in the world and coordinates ...
token.Clica per començar a dibuixar una línia: Click to start drawing a line
token.Clica per continuar dibuixant una línia: Click to continue drawing a line
token.Clica el primer punt per tancar aquesta: Click the first point to close this area
token.Clica el darrer punt per acabar la línia: Click the last point to finish the line

Combine with other sources of information.

token.Desa'l i decideix si fer-lo públic o pri: Save it and decide whether to make it public or private
token.Dinàmic: S'accedirà a la font de dades c: Dynamic: will access the data source each time you load the layer
token.Dona'ns el teu correo i et mantindrem in: Handle us your email and we'll keep you informed
token.El camp no pot estar buit: The field cannot be left empty
token.El canvi de contrasenya no s'ha processa: The password change was not processed correctly. Please try again or request your password
token.El mapa es publicarà amb la vista actual: Map will be published with the current view: geographical area, zoom levels and visible layers
token.El mapa es mostrarà a la galeria pública: The map will be displayed in the public gallery
token.El mapa només es mostrarà a la teva gale: The map will only be displayed in your private gallery
token.El mapa és visible a la galeria pública: The map is visible in the public gallery
token.El mapa només és visible a la teva galer: The map is only visible in your private gallery
token.El número de punts supera el màxim permè: The number of points exceeds the maximum allowed. Cut to 10000 or so and try again
token.El número de línies/polígons supera el m: The number of lines / polygons exceeds the maximum allowed. Cut to 2000 or so and try again
token.El número total de geometries supera el: The total number of geometries exceeds the maximum allowed. Cut to 6000 or so and try again
token.El teu registre no s'ha processat correc: Your account has not been created.
token.El teu registre s'ha processat correctam: Your account has been created succesfully. Thank you!
token.Eliminar el meu compte i esborrar-ho tot: Delete my account and erase everything
token.Eliminar el meu compte però mantenir els: Delete my account but keep my public maps in the Instamaps gallery
token.Els camps Nom_via, Portal i Municipi són: Fields Nom_via, Portal and Municipi are mandatory.
token.Els fitxers TIF, SID i JPG han d'anar di: TIF, JPG and SID files must be in a ZIP along with their TFW, SDW, JPW/JGW.
token.El procés de duplicar un mapa pot trigar: The process of cloning maps can take minutes. Please wait.
token.El processament del fitxer anterior enca: The processing of the previous file is still ongoing. Please wait until the end before sending a new file.
token.Els teus propis mapes de manera ràpida i: Your own maps quickly and easily
token.El vostre registre s'ha completat amb éx: Your registration has been completed successfully.
token.En compliment de la Llei Orgànica 15/199: In accordance with Organic Law 15/1999 of 13 December on the protection of personal data, we hereby inform you that personal data provided by this form is going to be stored in an automated computer file, whose responsible is the Institut Cartogràfic i Geològic de Catalunya, in order to allow the Internet access to ICGC’s products and services, as well as to keep you informed about the activities of the ICGC. You can exercise your rights to access, rectify or cancel the aforementioned data, by sending a letter to the Institut Cartogràfic i Geològic de Catalunya (Parc de Montjuïc, E-08038 Barcelona) or an e-mail to
token.En el mode 3D podeu seguir utilitzant la: In 3D mode almost all the functions of Instamaps can be used. But a few have been disabled.
token.Encara no has creat cap capa de dades: You don't have any data layer yet
token.Enllaça servidors WMS i TMS, i afegeix s: Link to WMS and TMS servers, and add JSON services.
token.Ens ajudes? Omple l'enquesta (1 minut): Can you help us? Fill out the survey (1 minute)
token.Entendre com utilitzeu aquesta eina i qu: Understanding how you use this tool and what other functionalitites you'd like to see is key for future developments.
token.Error: No s'ha pogut executar l'operació: Error: Could not perform the operation
token.Error de conversió: format o EPSG incorr: Conversion error: incorrect format or EPSG
token.Error durant el procés de conversió de f: Error during conversion of the file format. Check that the file is correct.
token.Error durant el processament de la infor: Error while processing information of the file. Check that the file is correct.
token.Error durant l'anàlisi de la informació: Error while analyzing information in the file. Check that the file is correct.
token.Error: No es pot generar el document: Error: Unable to generate the document
token.Errors freqüents en carregar arxius a In: Frequent errors when loading files in Instamaps
token.És la primera vegada que utilitzes Insta: Is this the first time you use InstaMaps.Geolocal?
token.Es genera una impressió de pantalla del: Generates a print screen of the map
token.Es genera un arxiu GeoPackage (base de d: Generates a GeoPackage file (database) containing only vector map layers and their attributes
token.Es genera un arxiu TIF que conté coorden: Generates a TIFF file with embedded coordinates - longitude and latitude - to be used in image processing and GIS applications
token.Es genera una vista prèvia que permet im: Generates a preview of the screen content to be printed on an A4 sheet
token.Es genera un arxiu PDF que conté capes i: Generates a PDF that contains layers and coordinates - longitude and latitude - readable by applications such as Adobe Acrobat, Adobe Reader and others.
token.Es mostraran només 100 resultats. Utilit: Only 100 results are shown. Use the filter to refine your search
token.Escriu el correu amb el que et vas enreg: Enter email address used when signing in
token.Escriu el correu electrònic de les perso: Enter the email addresses to invite people to cooperate in this map (maximum 10). Red indicates the people you invited but have not confirmed the reception of e- mail.
token.Escull el sistema de referència d'aquest: Choose reference system for this file
token.Escull els paràmetres que vols afegir al: Choose the settings you want to add to viewer
token.Escull les capes de dades que els altres: Choose the layers of information that other Instamaps users can download and reuse
token.Escull les teves icones i estils persona: Choose your icons and custom styles.
token.Escull si vols o no generar la llegenda: Choose whether or not you want to generate the associated map legend
token.Estat i incidències de trànsit, transpor: Conditions and traffic incidents, public transport, weather forecast and more.
token.Estem en procés d'actualització. Podeu o: We are updating the platform. Temporary anomalies can be observed when viewing the data.
token.Estem preparant el proper taller gratuït: We are preparing the next free workshop of InstaMaps, interested?
token.Estem preparant dos nous tallers d'Insta: We are preparing two wokshops of Instamaps (basic and advanced), interested?

token.Fes clic sobre el mapa per finalitzar: Click on the map to finish

token.Fes captures de pantalla per a informes: Take screenshots for reports and presentations.
token.Fes doble-clic sobre els elements per af: Double-click on items to add to the filter.
token.Fes les teves dades reutilitzables i tra: Make you data reusable and transparent
token.Fes la teva informació accessible a la c: Make your information accessible to citizens
token.Fes un mapa amb les teves dades fàcilmen: Make a map with your data easily
token.Feu clic i arrossegueu per rotar la càme: Click and drag to rotate the camera
token.Genera informes de parcel·les a partir d: Generates plot reports from the cadastral reference.
token.Gestiona els canvis del carrerer. Ajuda: Manage changes to the street map. Help keep the streets base of the ICGC.
token.Gestiona la informació relativa a protec: Manage information on public safety for increased citizen safety. Identify priority action points in case of an emergency.
token.Gràcies. Prenem nota del teu correu i t': Thank You. We take note of your email and we will notify you when we start the next workshop.
token.Ha caducat la sessió. Si vols continuar: Session expired. If you want to continue working sign in again
token.Ha superat el número màxim d'intents. Co: You have exceeded the maximum number of attempts. Account locked. Send an email to XXXX indicating your user name to proceed to unlock
token.Ha ocorregut un error inesperat durant l: An unexpected error has occurred while loading file
An unexpected error has occurred while downloading file
An unexpected error occurred during communication with the server. Please try again.
There was an unexpected problem when analyzing file information.
token.Has de seleccionar almenys una capa: You have to select at least one layer
token.Has de seleccionar un camp amb valors nu: You must select a field with numerical values
token.Hem migrat el teu compte d'Instamaps. A: Your Instamaps account has been migrated. You shall now log in with your ICGC credentials.

token.InstaMaps encara no està operatiu. Hi es: InstaMaps is not ready yet, we are working on it.

token.Instamaps carrega serveis WMS globals en: Instamaps loads global WMS services in EPSG:3857 and EPSG:4326
token.Introdueix un nom vàlid per a la publica: Enter a valid name for the publication of the map
token.I si us voleu inspirar per crear mapes e: And if you want inspiration to create stunning maps you can check the public gallery of maps shared by other users

token.L'adreça he de contenir: Nom carrer, núm: The address must contain: street name, number and municipality
token.L'anàlisi de la informació del fitxer no: Analysis of file information has not returned results. Check the file and try again.
token.L'estil bàsic genera una visualització d: The basic style generates a visualization of the elements of a layer uniformly for the whole set.
token.L'estil categories genera una visualitza: The categories style generates a visualization of the elements of a given layer from a numeric or text field of the data.
token.L'estil mides genera una visualització d: The measurement style generates a visualization of the elements of a layer from a numeric field of the data. Allows choosing between graduated interval or proportional to the value.
token.L'estil concentració genera una visualit: The density style generates a visualization of the elements of a layer from the data density as a heatmap.
token.L'estil agrupació genera una visualitzac: The cluster style generates a visualization of the elements of a layer from the density of the data grouped in proximity groups (clusters).
token.La contrasenya antiga no és correcte: The old password is not correct
token.La contrasenya ha de tenir un mínim de 4: The password has to be at least 5 characters long
token.La geoinformació de Catalunya i el món:: The geoinformation about Catalunya and the world:
token.La informació es mostra en funció de l'à: The information is retrieved based on the geographical area displayed.
token.La informació presentada no té valor nor: The information presented here does not have legal or normative validity
token.La llegenda del conjunt de les capes es: The legend of all the layers is shown continuously.
token.La llegenda permet a l'usuari selecciona: The legend allows the user to select the layer of interest.
token.La mida del fitxer supera el límit prees: The file size exceeds the preset limit (500MB).
The file size exceeds the preset limit for users who have not logged in (10MB).
The file size exceeds the preset limit for not dynamic external data (50MB).
The file size exceeds the preset limit for dynamic external data (25MB).
token.La mida mínima ha de ser inferior a la m: The minimum size must be less than the maximum
token.La nova contrasenya ja havia estat utili: The new password was already used
token.La pàgina que cerqueu no l'hem trobat al: The page you are looking for is not in our servers.
token.La Plataforma de Recursos de Geoinformac: The Platform of Geoinformation Resources (PRG) is a web space provided for government and its agencies and eventually for other organizations to reuse the huge catalog of available geoinformation on IDEC network along with other services and applications

token.La tecnologia WebGL que s'utilitza per l: WebGL technology uses intensively your computer and your browser. Depending on the configuration of your machine you will achieve better performance. Make sure your browser is up to date.
